Democratize technology, confront hypocrisy, and uplift those who create outside the norm
FACODI is born from this socio-political commitment: using accessible technology to open pathways in higher education, respecting cultural diversity, and celebrating popular knowledge.
Bring playlists, public PDFs, articles, and ideas to strengthen the digital community college and keep the curriculum diverse.
